title: Asian Bowl
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Ovo, Chinese, Fast food, Delivery, Take-out, Asian Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Wide variety of Asian cuisines including from Chinese and Thai to Japanese and Korean. All dishes are prepared family style, no MSG or canned food. A separate vegetarian menu includes some dishes that are vegan, and all can be made vegan upon request. Has mock-chicken, mock-beef, and tofu; has tofu cheesecake for dessert.
